sentences.sContent: I realize that I'm seeing Tim as he is in the world, with no reference to me at all.
sentences.sCn: 我意识到我所看到的，是蒂姆在他的世界里的生活，而这个世界和我一点关系也没有。

sentences.sContent: "Tim Howard was 'Man Of The Match' and that was proof of how strong we were, " said David James, without flinching.
sentences.sCn: 大卫詹姆斯没有任何畏惧的说：“蒂姆霍华德是比赛的救星，而这证明了我们的强大。”

phrases.pCn: 蒂姆·伯顿（美国著名导演）
